response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item comes with a multitude of features and capabilities that surpass those of its competitors. Given its unique value proposition, we believe it is worth more than $800,000 to us. However, recognizing that value is subjective and deeply personal, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to secure a groundbreaking asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
